mapper.select:
select * from project p where 1=1
and (s.xmmc like '%'||#{xmmc}||'%' )
and (s.kfqymc like '%'||#{kfqymc}||'%' )
and s.audit_type=#{auditType}
and p.kgrq>=#{startTime})
and p.jgrq<=#{endTime})
order by p.SYS_DATE desc

insert.selectKey: select count(*) from wf_audit p where p.PROJECTID=#{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
insert.if: update wf_audit p set p.shsj=#{shsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, p.shry=#{shry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, p.shrq=#{shrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, p.bz=#{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, p.SYS_UPD_DATE=#{sysdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where p.id = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

insert into wf_audit( id, shsj, shry, shrq, bz, PROJECTID, SYS_DATE ) values ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{shry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

mapper.update: update project t set t.audit_type = #{type} WHERE t.id = #{id}
